title: Factorial of N
description:
Given a non-negative integer $N$, calculate $N!$ (N factorial).

$N!$ is defined as:
$$ N! = N \times (N-1) \times \dots \times 1 $$

Note that $0! = 1$.
editorial:
We can solve this problem using either iteration or recursion.

**Recursive Approach:**
$$ f(n) = n \times f(n-1) $$
Base case: $f(0) = 1$.
